name: Ettin Etiquette
description: The last time you saw these Ettin creatures, they were slower and weaker. These two- headed monsters from the Hexen universe are now in Hell, and would you believe it... you're out of ammo! You may as well dump your weapons 'cause you won't find any ammo here; the Ettin have never been known to use anything other than a spiked mace. You'd better find yourself a Mace of Retribution (a.k.a. Power Mace) quickly, or the locals in this corner of Hell are going to give you a lesson in the finer points of... E T T I N E T I Q U E T T E
